info.name: Habitica Sticky Header
info.description: Makes header with avatar and HP/XP/MP bars, etc. stick to the top of the screen. (Also makes the round create task button sticky as well, mostly because it looks better IMO.)
info.additionalInfo:
Update 2018-10-02: Remove special inn spacing since the site seems to intelligently handle that on its own now.

Update 2018-05-27: Restickied the navbar part of the header! (Slightly adjusted code from Riverstone in the Aspiring Tailors guild.)

Update 2018-04-13: Adjusted for inn banner so this style doesn't cover up 40px of the page when the user is checked into the inn and hasn't dismissed the inn banner at the top of the screen.

---

I don't *think* there are any bugs but let me know if you find one!
